about_the_game:
Castle of Blackwater is a 2D, action-packed, social deduction game with a magical twist. In this intense game of trust and betrayal, up to 10 strangers are trapped in a castle of danger and deception, with a mission to complete tasks and escape with their lives.

Some will work together, forming bonds and strong alliances. Others will pretend and deceive, with their own interests at heart. Each player will receive a unique role, belonging to one of three factions, with abilities to support their playstyle. Using these special powers, as well as their own deductive reasoning, players must uncover those working against them before getting eliminated themselves.

Alive players can utilize many of the in-game tools to help them put together the pieces of the puzzle. Dead players will have the opportunity to collect and spend souls, buying mighty power-ups that can help turn the tide for their team from beyond the grave.

In the ever-lasting battle between good and evil, only one side will survive to claim the Castle’s victory.

When lives are at stake and the truth has no meaning,

Who will you trust?

This Game Includes:

  • 3 factions with different win objectives and playstyles

  • 10 unique characters with active and passive abilities, more to be released!

  • Various game mechanics including a day cycle, night cycle, voting round, and more!

  • Private and public game lobbies!

  • Built-in proximity voice & text chat!

  • 30+ skill-based mini-games

  • Loads of cosmetics to personalize your ghost character with weapons, shields, pets, emotes, dances, and much more!

Conquer the Castle in Style!


Complete Tasks as Protectors & Expose the Satanic Among You!

Unleash Chaos as the Satanic!

Hunt Your Prey as the Werewolf!

Aid Your Faction from Beyond the Grave!


Join Our Community!

Many members are joining our Discord to receive exclusive launch gifts and keep up to date with the development. We're a small but active team, so if you have any suggestions or questions, we would love to talk to you on Discord.

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: OSX 11 or later
  • Processor: Dual-core Intel i5 or Intel i7
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel Integrated HD 6100 or higher
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 3 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: Proximity Chat requires a 10 Mbps Up/Down connection

  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Integrated Apple GPU (7-core or higher)
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 4 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: Proximity Chat requires a 10 Mbps Up/Down connection
